div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

name.value: eHealth Platform Belgium
Message Structure eHealth

description.value: Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

name.value: Logical Models

description.value: Data Models representing the data structures and requirements for interoperability.

name.value: PlanDefinitions (services)

description.value: PlanDefinitions defining the service endpoints for using the PSS. These have the inputs and outputs represented by the profiles

name.value: Resource Profiles

description.value: These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide
These define additional elements that can be exchanged with the respective FHIR resources

name.value: PSS Consent

description.value: Consent statement about using PSS and agreeing with (or opting out of) the Terms and Conditions.

name.value: PSS Data Acquisition Form

description.value: The PSS Data Acquisition Form is used to inform what data needs to be acquired and provided to the PSS system.

name.value: PSS Feedback

description.value: Feedback containing the acceptance of the PSS results.

name.value: PSS Feedback Code Reasons

description.value: Feedback code reasons for PSS

description.value: Feedback code reasons for PSS

name.value: PSS MedicationRequest Task

description.value: PSS MedicationRequest - using anonymised patient

name.value: PSS Questionnaire Task

description.value: PSS Task for Questionnaire - using anonymised patient

name.value: PSS Rating Extension

description.value: A clinician-friendly rating, or score, for the recommendation; patient-friendly if the recommendation is patient-facing.

name.value: PSS Relevant Patient Age

description.value: The approximate, relevant age of the patient at the time of the search.

name.value: PSS Request

description.value: A request for PSS (Prescriber Support System) results.

name.value: PSS Request Bundle

description.value: The PSS Request Data Bundle is used to request data from the PSS system.

name.value: PSS Response

description.value: A response containing the results from the PSS.

name.value: PSS Response Bundle

description.value: The PSS Response Bundle is used to return data from the PSS system.

name.value: PSS Response Communication Request

description.value: All PSS responses contain a PSS Communication Request conformant to this profile.

name.value: PSS Response Medication Request

description.value: The PSS Response Medication Request is used when the PSS system returns a MedicationRequest

name.value: PSS Response Request Group

description.value: All PSS responses contain a PSS RequestGroup conformant to this profile.

name.value: PSS Response Service Request

description.value: The PSS Response Service Request is used when the PSS system returns a ServiceRequest

name.value: PSS-QSI condition codes

description.value: Condition codes from the QSI system

name.value: PSS-QSI procedure codes

description.value: Procedure codes from the QSI system
